    window_blackman

    window_blackman.Rd

    Blackman window for FFT

    window_blackman(n)

    Arguments

    n

    length of signal (integer)

    Value

    window

    Examples

    window_blackman(100)
#>   [1] -1.387779e-17  3.630468e-04  1.458490e-03  3.305086e-03  5.933599e-03
